sentences.sContent: He rested his left handlightly but firmly on the half-opened flap of  his  satchel.
sentences.sContent_eng: He rested his left handlightly but firmly on the half-opened flap of his satchel.
sentences.sCn: 他将左手放松，但却紧紧抓住了半开口的小背包。

trans.tranOther: a leather bag that you carry over your shoulder, used especially in the past by children for carrying books to school
